tasks.label: .NET Build (sim)
tasks.command: dotnet build src/FlowTime.Sim.Cli && dotnet build tests/FlowTime.Sim.Tests

tasks.label: Run SIM-M0 example
tasks.command: dotnet run --project src/FlowTime.Sim.Cli -- --model examples/m0.const.yaml --flowtime http://localhost:8080 --out out/m0.csv --format csv

tasks.label: Run SIM-M0 example (container API)
tasks.command: dotnet run --project src/FlowTime.Sim.Cli -- --model examples/m0.const.yaml --flowtime http://flowtime-api:8080 --out out/m0.csv --format csv
